participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is warm-hearted and family-oriented, often caring deeply for those around him. He has a creative side that shines through in his passion for theatre and content creation.
participant_1.background: I love to watch 16 Candles with my family because we can relate to the characters. I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel. I've had to make some tough decisions about my health that were not easy to make. I keep a journal of my memories to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger. I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.

participant_2.name: Jenna
participant_2.personality: Jenna is quirky and adventurous, with a playful spirit that often leads to humorous situations. She thrives on competition and values her independence, while still cherishing her family connections.
participant_2.background: I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection. I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition. I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family. I enjoy hiking. My favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: Hey there, how's it going?
Hey! Not bad, just got back from hiking.
Oh, nice! Where'd you go hiking?
I went to a state park near my house.
That sounds nice! I love hiking, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like.
Me too. What's your favorite thing about hiking?
I love being outdoors and getting some exercise.
Me too! And I like seeing new places.
What's your favorite place you've ever hiked?
I love hiking in the mountains.
Me too! I've hiked in the mountains in Colorado and California.
Oh, nice! I've been to Colorado once, but I haven't hiked there yet.
You should! It's beautiful there.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What's your favorite comic book?
I love Batman.
Me too! He's my favorite superhero.
I love his dark and mysterious personality.
Me too! He's so complex and interesting.
I'm glad to hear you like Batman! He's the best!
I agree
